# configurations

## .common.env

```env
SERVER_PORT=
SERVER_HOST=
SERVER_LIMIT=
```

## .development.env || .production.env

```env
# CORS Configurations
CORS_ORIGINS='[ ]'
CORS_CREDENTIALS=

# JWT Configurations
JWT_SECRET=
JWT_ACCESS_TOKEN_EXPIRES_IN=
JWT_REFRESH_TOKEN_EXPIRES_IN=
JWT_AUDIENCE=
JWT_SUBJECT=
JWT_ISSUER=

# DB Cofigurations
DB_TYPE=
DB_HOST=
DB_PORT=
DB_USERNAME=
DB_PASSWORD=
DB_DATABASE=
DB_SYNC=
DB_LOGGING=
```
